name: crypticpay
description: Kryptik is an online platform for sending and collecting cryptocurrency. The Kryptik website simplifies digital ownership, by providing a simple cryptocurrency wallet— compatible with multiple blockchains— and a social NFT marketplace. All software is free and open source, with the belief that better blockchain technology will lead to a better world.

scripts.publish: npm run release && dotnet publish -c Release

author: Jett Hays
